messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

oracle time sheet errors sent monday sheet errors importance high dear could you kindly help with errors described below have encountered app cannot submit retroactively off for last friday rd would you be kind instead cannot submit timecard for working week th because below error please advise or if possible fix have edited for working week st th reflect off st but error below popped up after made changes able fix delete could you help with one too for was closed approved but entries for weeks highlighted below still appear incomplete only saved any action you can take clean up inconsistencies history also got error for last week sheet working days should be submitted with each you able fix well please let know if any question thanks for your kind regards analyst extension

message.reasoning:
**Categorizing IT Ticket**

I need to categorize an IT ticket based on the content, which talks about Oracle time sheet errors, submission issues, and inconsistencies. It doesn’t seem to fit categories like Hardware or Access. It might align with “Administrative rights” if the problem is permission-related, but primarily, it falls under “HR Support” since time sheets are HR/payroll systems. The best fitting category is definitely “HR Support.” I should output this as a JSON object with the type set to "object."**Crafting JSON Response**

The prompt instructs me to create a JSON object with the category field set to "HR Support." I see that the required enum includes specific strings, so I need to ensure I only provide one of those options. I can formulate the response like this: {"category":"HR Support"}. I must remember to close it properly and focus solely on this JSON format, without adding any other text or explanations. So, I’ll finalize it just like that!
